channel.title: How to bank character equipment?

item.title: How to bank character equipment?
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

Well i tried this but it didnt workâ€¦
Its in the clickbutton class.

case 82024: if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>Sorry but you can't deposit in the wilderness."); return; } else { for(int ko = 0; ko<c.playerEquipment.length; ko++){ if(c.playerEquipment[ko] != -1){ c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerEquipment[ko], ko, 1); } } } break;
